11.content:
Naruto was feeling rather nervous. For the past few weeks he had noticed the people of Konoha looking at him differently. At first he thought that they were finally starting to acknowledge him and see him for who is was but, then the letters started coming. As of recent, Naruto had been getting odd letters delivered to his home. In the beginning he had just brushed them off but, now they were starting to get real freaky. As he walked through the streets of Konoha, Naruto thought back to the letters he had been getting for the past week. Many of them showed the same thing, drawings of various women eating Naruto whole or in part, with cryptic wording such as "I want us to become whole," or "I want the taste of your ramen on my lips" accompanying the drawings. The last few didn't show Naruto at all, just the girl with a bloated stomach, the kind expected if she had swallowed a 13 year old male whole. And that hadn’t even been the freakiest of them all. No, that went to the painting he had found outside his door one day. It showed a faceless girl with long straight brown hair with a braid on one side wearing a dark pink kimono-like shirt that had a long right sleeve and a short left sleeve held closed by a wide pink sash over red mesh armor and a pair of violet baggy pants. But, the part that scared him was how the pink sash was undone and the kimono top was left partly open, allowing that massive stomach the faceless girl was sporting to hang down freely. The shape of a person was clearly able to be seen through the stomach and the pile of orange clothes only helped to solidify the fact that this picture was showing a girl with him inside the stomach. Despite how terrifying the picture was and the nightmares it gave him, he held on to it. Mostly in hopes he could use the picture to pick out who was sending these creepy letters. That is, at least what his plan had been until he took a better look at the other pictures and saw that none of the words or pictures were the same, meaning that it was likely more than one person sending him these letters.

Currently he was walking around the village, trying to calm his nerves. It wasn’t working. Then again, he really shouldn’t have expected it to, what with nearly the entire population of Konoha, especially the females, looking at him with this look of hunger then their eyes. It was the same look he gave a big bowl of Miso ramen after being denied ramen for a few days. He never thought that he would’ve preferred the looks of hate he had been living with for so long but, they were definitely better then the looks of hunger he could see in a large part of the populace. Even some of his friends were looking at him differently. He could pick out one or two who had that same look of hunger pass through their eyes but, some of the others were giving him looks that were different still and he didn’t like it.

He sighed as he turned a corner, hoping that this weirdness would pass soon. The last thing he wanted was to be eaten alive by someone in his own village, much less someone that he trusted. He continued walking as he let his thoughts run. ‘Then again, if I’m going to be eaten alive I’d much rather it be by a cute girl.’ He thought. Images of his teammate Sakura, the blond gossip Ino, the weapon mistress TenTen, and the shy but kind hearted Hyuga heiress Hinata moved through his mind. Idly he wondered which one he would prefer being eaten by and what they would look like with a massive Naruto sized belly. As much as he didn’t want to die, he couldn’t help but, wonder these things as he continued moving.

Turning another corner he…

111.content:
Naruto almost had a heart attack when he bumped -- quite literally -- into his crush and teammate, Sakura Haruno.

"S-Sakura-chan...!" he yelped, his heart racing from the sudden collision. The pinkette was lying sprawled on the ground in front of him, a number of important-looking papers scattered this way and that. "Are you okay?"

The petite kunoichi looked up at him a little blankly at first, a dazed expression on her face. But this passed in just a few seconds, and her expression changed noticeably when she registered with whom it was she had collided.

Despite a situation that would normally have her cursing the blond out and trying to bash in that maddeningly thick skull of his, Sakura smiled.

"Oh, yes," she said, her eyes gleaming a little ominously. "I'm fine. Just a little hungry, you know?"

Naruto rapidly paled when he saw the pinkette lick her lips, still looking intently straight at him. Warning signs were popping up left and right, and klaxons were blaring in his head as Sakura proceeded to slowly gather her papers back up -- never taking more than one eye off of him as she did so -- before standing and casually brushing off her dark-ish red dress.

"Hungry...?" he said a little anxiously, extremely nervous and feeling unusually vulnerable.

"Famished," Sakura said, eyes twinkling merrily as she stared directly at him.

Naruto gulped. Yet, in spite of the apparent situation, he couldn't help trying to leverage this for his own benefit. "Um, wanna go to Ichiraku's...?" he asked her. "It could be like a date."

Sakura threw her head back and laughed. "No!" she answered cheerfully -- far too cheerfully. "I'm thinking of something much more substantial." She then licked her lips a second time, and her smile gained an uncharacteristically sultry quality. "In fact..." she said, humming thoughtfully. "Why don't we go to my place? I'll cook up something to eat."

She winked -- actually winked -- before turning to leave. She walked a few steps, swaying her hips enticingly, before turning her head to look back over her shoulder at Naruto.

"Well?" she asked him, giving him unmistakable bedroom eyes. "Do you want to come, Naruto?"

The blond gulped.

1112.content:
Shrugging, Naruto decided to go with. Who knew when Sakura might make this kind of offer again? Plus, the way she was swinging her hips as she walked was sexy enough that she could have gotten him to agree to anything.

So he followed Sakura to her house, eager for the date.

That poor, oblivious fool.

When they got to Sakura's place, Naruto was surprised to see that none of the lights were on.

"Where are your parents?" he asked Sakura a little worriedly. Most of the adults in the village didn't exactly like him, after all.

"Out," was all the answer she gave him, opening the front door and gesturing for Naruto to go inside. "Come on in, take your shoes off," she said, smiling in a way that made Naruto's stomach feel all strange and fluttery, and his pants feel strangely a little bit tighter.

Emerald eyes twinkled, cast over Naruto's frame as he walked inside before Sakura, and the pinkette licked her lips. Her eyes lingered especially on the blond's posterior, imagining a savory Naruto rump roast.

Grinning wickedly in the shadows of the unlit entry hallway, Sakura shut the door behind her. Then she locked it, sticking the key into a very private place that her tasty-looking teammate almost certainly wouldn't be getting a chance to look at. All the other exits were similarly sealed.

Naruto would not be escaping.

"Feel free to make yourself at home, Naruto~" Sakura called out to the blond. "I'll make some tea, and then draw you up a bath for starters. How does that sound❤?"

She heard Naruto yelp, and she could easily envision the blush that was no doubt forming on his face.

"Th-that sounds good..." he called back, sounding a little hesitant. Most likely this was more because of nerves than anything else.

Sakura smiled, and she went to grab a teapot. She brewed some up (not bothering to check what kind it was) in a few minutes using the good burner on their stove, and poured some out into two cups. One was pink and the other was blue, and fragrant steam wafted up from the cups.

Next, she took out a small baggy of a finely ground, odorless powder, and stirred it into Naruto's cup. This was a potent sleeping drug she had concocted using an old recipe she'd found in a book belonging to her late great grandmother. According to the description, the powder was impossible to detect using human senses, and so powerful that even an elephant could be knocked out for a day using just a thimble-full of the stuff.

And as for someone Naruto's size, according to Sakura's calculations, this dosage would effectively put him into a sleep from which there was no waking -- within a reasonable degree of metabolic deviation, at any rate. Of course it wouldn't take effect right away, but that was what the bath was for. No practical pot would be big enough to cook the blond, but a bathtub could do the trick. It was an old fashioned furo, which meant she could heat the water to boiling once Naruto slipped out of consciousness and make herself some loudmouth blond stew.

And she licked her lips at that thought. Naruto would be doing half the work for her, if her plan carried through, and she would be sitting pretty with a belly-full of delicious teammate, diets be damned.

But would her plan work?

1112111.content:
"I'll prepare you in a stew!" Sakura decided.

With a happy hum, she increased the heat of the water and began dicing up various vegetables. Once the tab was adequately filled with vegetables, Sakura began sprink.ling an array of spices into the water that would ultimately compliment and enhance Naruto's flavor. She sampled the water and smiled in satisfaction - everything was tasting great!

Now that the "broth" was taken care of, it was time for the main course himself. Sakura grabbed a dry rub and began massaging it onto Naruto's unconscious body. The hot water was doing it's job, a delicious aroma of cooked Naruto slowly began wafting into Sakura's nostrils. She practically drooled at the smell. It was tempting just to devour him now, but she had taken the time to start preparing him, she might as well see it through to the end. Besides... once he was fully prepared he would be that much tastier.

Finally, the dry rub was fully applied. Now she just had to wait. Sakura glanced at a clock.

"Hmm... about ten more minutes should do the trick." Sakura said. She really didn't want to wait any longer, but she knew it would be worth it in the end. She sat back and waited for her meal to finish cooking. To Sakura's surprise, Naruto's eyes slowly drooped open after about six minutes. She wasn't surprised that he was still alive (she wanted him alive after all, the hot water was just to boil him a little and tenderize his skin), but with the dose of knockout drugs he took, he should be out for days.

"Sah...Sakura?" Naruto asked in confusion.

"Hello, Naruto. I'm surprised you're awake."

"What do you mean..." Naruto mumbled, life starting to return to his eyes as he regained his full senses. "Why is it so hot in here..."

"I'm cooking you." Sakura replied nonchalantly. "I want you to be tender when I eat you."

"EAT ME?!" Naruto suddenly yelled in surprise, his eyes snapping fully open. He glanced around himself in terror. There were all kinds of vegetables, the water smelled like it had spices in it, and he was coated in some kind of... rub! "No no no! Not you!"

"Not me?" Sakura quirked an eyebrow.

"You can't be one of the people who sent me those creepy letters! You're my teammate!"

"I'm not your dinner!"

"You have about three more minutes to cook, and then yes you will be." Sakura grinned. "And just so you know, you smell delicious."

"I won't let you eat me..." Naruto protested. He tried to move his body, but to no avail.

"You can't move your body unless I let you." Sakura explained when she saw the confused look on his face. "I put a little seal on you to prevent you from giving me any trouble. But don't worry, I'll let you move around all you want once you're taking a little dip in my stomach acids."

"Sakura, please don't do this! I don't want to be eaten! Let me go. I will never say a word about this to anyone."

"You won't." Sakura chuckled. "But that's because you'll just have added to my curves. Breast and butt fat can't talk."

"I'll do anything you want! I'll be your personal servant forever!"

"I'm only interested in dinner." Sakura replied. "Two minutes left."

"You need to cook me longer!" Naruto blurted in panic. He didn't know how to get out of this, but he needed all the time he could get if he was going to figure something out."

"I definitely do not. I don't want to cook you to death. You're going to die in here." Sakura patted her stomach with a predatory grin.

"I'll give you every penny I ever make! Think of me as a disposable income!" Naruto attempted to bargain again. "You would never have to work a day in your life!"

"I do think of you as disposable." Sakura chuckled. "Just in a different kind of way than income. One more minute, then it's dinner time."

"FUCK! Stop this, Sakura!" Naruto yelled in a truly panicked voice. Seeing his utter terror struck something primal and predatory in Sakura. Seeing that fear in her soon-to-be dinner only made her want to eat him that much more. She slowly licked her lips in anticipation of the upcoming meal.

"D-don't lick your lips like that!" Naruto sputtered in fear. "Get me out of here!"

"I'll get you out of there in 30 seconds, Naruto." Sakura said with a smug grin. "I'll get you out of that bath so you can take your final bath in my stomach acids."

"NO NO NO! I DON'T WANT THIS!"

"10 seconds!" Sakura said with anticipation. Her mouth was salivating.

"PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE DON'T EAT ME! I'M NOT FOOD!"

1112111.title: Sakura decides to cook Naruto in a stew

Sakura grabbed Naruto's shoulders and lifted him out of the tub. She thought about swallowing him head first, but then she wouldn't be able to see his face as she swallowed him down. The only problem was that nature was taking its course. His body was cooling off rapidly. He would be at a safe temperature for Sakura to eat any second now! "Finally! Cool enough to eat!"

"Ready to meet your destiny?" Sakura taunted. "I hope you are, because I'm starving!"

Both because he tasted absolutely heavenly and because his desperate pleas and struggles evoked something in her predatorial side that she couldn't explain, but that she absolutely loved. She had to wait a while for this, but it was definitely worth the wait.

She had been so angry when Naruto was placed on her team, but now, it was totally worth it. She wouldn't have gotten this opportunity to devour him if she wasn't his teammate. Their training/mission schedules would be different. She barely saw the other people she graduated with, and she definitely didn't have time to build a sense of trust with them to lure them into a trap like this.

As her lips reached his sternum, she reflected on when she first decided he was going to be her dinner. Naruto asked if she wanted to get lunch with her now that they were on the same team, and she of course said no. Then, an idle thought drifted through her head. She thought to herself, the only way she would get lunch with Naruto is if he were her lunch. That thought then spiraled and morphed until she decided that, with absolutely certainty, Naruto Uzumaki was going to be her dinner.

It was quite fun for her after that. Every time he proudly proclaimed that he was going to be the strongest, that he would surpass Sasuke, that he would become hokage... It took everything she had not to giggle. Because she knew the truth. He was going to be coated in her stomach acids and digested long before he could ever hope to achieve any of those ridiculous goals. He was going to be fat on her butt (and hopefully her boobs).

"Sa-Sakura..." Naruto stammered out. This was the first coherent thing he said since she started swallowing him. She took another swallow so everything but his shoulders and above were inside her.

"Please... please, I beg of you... Don't do this. I'll help you find someone else to have. Hell, I'll help you prepare them! Just...please... don't eat me."

Sakura giggled and a predatory, yet smug and victorious look flashed across her eyes. In reply to Naruto's plea, she took another swallow, sending his shoulders down.

"No! PLEASE! SAKURA, YOU CAN'T DO THIS! I'M YOUR TEAMMATE!"

Sakura just flashed Naruto a cruel look before taking another swallow. Now only his head remained in the outside world. She paused, because she wanted to savor this moment. This was the moment that she would be completely victorious over Naruto. She waited for his eyes to travel to her now bulging stomach and she reveled in the horrified cry he emitted upon seeing the results of his body in hers.

"PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE! I'LL DO ANYTHING!" Naruto sobbed.

Sakura flashed him one final smug look and swallowed, sending his head into her mouth. She closed her mouth over Naruto's head, sealing him inside. She giggled again when she heard his muffled cries. She was on cloud nine. This was it. This was the moment. She leaned her head back and took one powerful final swallow, sending Naruto's head down her throat to join the rest of his body.

*burp!

"Mmm... that's good. Squirm for me, Naruto." Sakura moaned. "That will just cover you in my stomach acids that much quicker!"

"Thanks for that. And now you've saved me not having an amazing dinner tonight! You're so helpful." Sakura added the last part in a mocking voice. "Now, if you don't mind, would you quiet down a little? My favorite show to watch after dinner is on. Do digest quietly from here on out, ok?"

"HOW...OWWW FUCK! How... can you do this to me..." Naruto ground out.

"Quiet!" Sakura slapped her stomach, eliciting a howl of pain from the meal trapped inside of it.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ------
SIX HOURS LATER
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ------

For the next six hours, Sakura watched TV while enjoying the struggles of her dinner. Naruto did not in fact quiet down when she told him. He still screamed out in agony and pleaded for mercy. But Sakura was glad he did, because she loved hearing it. She would have to catch her shows later, but that was ok. Her stomach steadily shrunk as she digested the idiot, but to her surprise, he was still alive inside of her six hours later. She had heard that live meals like Naruto would usually be dead within a few hours, and they usually passed out before that. But here Naruto was, still going strong.

"You're still alive?" She yawned, taunting him some more. "God, you really are the best dinner ever! I'm glad you're still here, but how the hell haven't you been completely digested yet?"

Sakura may not have known how he was still alive, but inside of her stomach, Naruto knew exactly what...the Kyuubi. The evil fox demon wasn't content with letting him digest quickly... oh no. It was working to regenerate his body. The dim red light of the Kyuubi's foul chakra provided just enough light in the chamber of Sakura's stomach that Naruto could see the state of his body. And it was not a pretty sight to say the least. Right now, the Kyuubi was working on regenerating his right arm, which Naruto had painfully felt (and watched) get dissolved earlier.

"P-please..." He weakly begged. "It's not too late... let me out." He knew that was a lie. It was too late. Despite the Kyuubi's attempts to regenerate his body, Sakura's stomach acids were the more powerful force. She had digested half of his body right now. Even if she did let him out, it would be too late. He was...dinner.

"Hahaha." Sakura laughed. "Still begging for mercy. I love it!"

And did she ever love it. This feeling of absolute victory was one she would cherish for years to come. Naruto was trying as hard as he could to survive in her gut, but her stomach acids were still breaking him down. It may take longer than she initially thought, but he would eventually be nothing more than fat on her butt/boobs and crap. She had taken a boy who had grand aspirations and dreams, and turned him into a worthless dinner. In the end, Naruto would be no better than a hamburger or a salad, or even one of the Naruto pieces in a bowl of ramen he was named after!

She started laughing even harder at that thought. She couldn't not share it.

"You can't..." Naruto futilely begged.

"I don't know why you're still fighting it. Your name is Naruto, which is a topping in ramen. Clearly, you were meant to be someone's dinner. You're just lucky I decided to make you the main course instead of a mere topping. I'm giving you a bigger honor here than you deserved!"

The sound of Naruto's pained weeping was music to Sakura's ears. All the times he had annoyed her, gotten in between her and Sasuke... This was the greatest night of her life.

As the hours progressed, Sakura's stomach slowly but surely shrank bit by bit. It was getting late, but Sakura did not want to miss a second of this. Kushina suddenly felt strange as a mysterious seal on her back made her mouth shrink back down to normal size and she couldn't get it wide again. Kushina looks back behind her with a mad glare to see who prevented her from rightfully (in her eyes right now ) punishing HER son. Her eyes widened in shock at who she saw. "No...No way...." before her was a woman with long, bright-red hair and large, pupiless eyes. She wore an elaborate, high-collared kimono with the Uzushiogakure symbol on the back of the obi which was tied around her waist. Her hair was arranged in buns with hair pins in them and three clips in the front. She also wore a dark shade of red lipstick and had a gem-like marking on her forehead, reminiscent of the Strength of a Hundred Seal. She also wore tags with kanji written on them in her hair decals. This woman was Mito Uzumaki Kushina's and Naruto's predecessor as the Kyuubi Jinchuriki. Kushina was stunned seeing her here in her prime. "Mito-sama..."


"Kushina what were you thinking trying that? You know you would regret it for all eternity." Mito scolded Kushina how a mother would scold a bad child.

Naruto was stunned seeing his mother look like a young girl who did something bad as she got off him and looked at the other red head with guilt. "But Mito-sama the way he died was so embarrassing....!"

"That doesn't matter, also its the village's fault for not teaching him correctly anyways." Mito said with disgust towards her husband's former village. "Also they think they got rid of the Kyuubi they gravelly underestimate that demons power and will to live."

Kushina nodded knowing her predecessor was correct, if her son had been properly taught he could've easily detected Sakuras trickery and escaped being her dinner. The anger was gone replaced by guilt and sorrow. The village had no idea that Sakura had eaten Naruto in vain. She should've recalled just how tenacious the fox was from having it inside her for over a decade. "What can we do Mito-sama?"

"Nothing, it is clear that village is not the same one Hashi-kun and his brother made centuries ago," Mito replied. "They even erased all records of our clans history I refuse to save a place that has corrupted itself."

Kushina was stunned but she couldn't help but agree, Konoha had celebrated Naruto's death instead of mourn which only made the fact she had been about to eat her son herself before Mito stopped her all the more painful.

"Also Kushina, my seal not only stopped you from eating Naruto but it separated you from him as well, I know you had sealed a portion of yourself to help him with the Kyuubi." Mito spoke the younger Uzumaki.

"Thank you Mito-sama, but since Minato-kun is forever trapped in the stomach of the Death God...I'm staying with Naruto. I need to not only make up for all the years I wasn't there to raise him, but also for my unjust and stupid actions earlier," Kushina said looking back at her son with guilt but also the material love she would've provided had she survived that night.

Naruto gets up looking at his mother and the other woman. "So the fox isn't dead with me?"

"No Naruto, the Kyuubi is literally living chakra given form...Despite what Tsunade believes the fox is very much alive and I have a feeling it will be using your so called teammate as a body soon." Kushina informed her son in a grave tone.

Part of Naruto wanted to be brought back to attempt to help Sakura until he remembered how she treated him over the years especially while she had been devouring him. He had had enough of the horrid treatment for once the hero would not be so...He would let the village suffer for their own mistakes and treatment.


Back in Konoha...
