He paused for a moment. His overly paranoid senses kicking in and alerting him to the fact that he was being followed. Continuing on he took a turn around a nearby corner and quickly made a shadow clone while using the Transformation jutsu to disguise himself as an old man with a wooden cane. Waiting for his pursuer to turn the corner he felt his apprehension dissolve upon seeing the familiar rectangular box with cut out eyeholes and a rocklike pattern for camouflage. 'There’s only one group of kids I know of that would use such an obvious disguise.’ The blond thought.

Despite the eyeholes, the box still bumped into him. From the whispers he heard just before the box bumped him, Naruto could tell that they had been arguing about something rather than paying attention to where they were going. Raising his cane he gave the box a few taps, "Correct me if I'm wrong children but, I'm pretty sure that rocks aren't square shaped nor do they have eyeholes." Mentally Naruto smirked as he played the part of an old man.

The reaction he got was expected so he wasn't surprised in the slightest when an explosion of colored smoke came from the box. He also wasn't surprised to find the kids coughing and mutters of 'too much gunpowder' coming from them. Naruto was surprised however to see not three but, four kids on the ground coughing. He quickly snapped out of it however when Konohamaru jumped up and started speaking. "Hey Old Man, why'd you go and blow our cover like that? How are we suppose to surprise the Boss if someone goes and blows our cover like that?!?" Naruto merely shook his head, "Boy, your Boss would have to be blind to not notice a rock with perfect angles and eyeholes following him."

"I told you it wouldn't work Kono-kun but, you didn't want to listen." Naruto's eyes quickly shot to the new member of Konohamaru's little group. 'Hmm, she looks a lot like Hinata.' And indeed the little girl did look a lot like the shy Hyuga heiress. The girl had long dark brown hair and her bangs were parted so only a single lock of hair fell in front of her face. Most noticeably however, was that she had large, white eyes that held a hint of lilac in them. A sleeveless, purple v-neck shirt, with mesh armor underneath, shorts of the same purple color and ninja-blue sandals. "Don't be like that Hanabi-chan. Besides, Boss never noticed we were here." The boy was clearly ignored by the girl who was instead looking at Naruto as if she was confused as to why she was seeing some old man in front of them. The old man in question simply raised an eyebrow as Hanabi seemed to suddenly realize something. "You’re wrong Kono-kun because Naruto is right here."

Seeing the confused looks on the other kids faces Naruto decided that he had messed with them enough; for now at least. A small bang and a good bit of smoke later reviled Naruto, grin and all. "You noticed rather quickly. Mind if I ask though, are you by chance related to Hinata? And I don't just mean as a Hyuga." The little girl grinned at that before proudly proclaiming, "She's my big sister." Naruto found it kind of cute how she spoke like it was the greatest thing in the world to be Hinata's little sister. And who knows, maybe it was. Hinata was a great person after all.

"Hey Boss will you play ninja with us?" Naruto paused a moment considering the idea. "Play what?" Konohamaru was quick to try and answer. "How about ninja Ta..." "Let's play Missing Nin!" Everyone looked at Moegi surprised that she had just cut in like that. "Missing Nin huh?" Naruto looked over the four. Moegi looked pleased with the suggestion where as Konohamaru seemed willing to play if only just. Udon as usual was neutral about either choice and the newest member of this marry band of trouble makers seemed curious.

Missing Nin was a game that Naruto had come up with that pits the more experienced player (himself) vs. the less experienced. The goal of the game was to capture the Missing Nin before the time-limit expired. Its main purpose was to teach the kids how to capture a fleeing target while avoiding traps left by said target. Naruto was normally more than willing to play this game but, with how things have been recently he wasn't too sure he wanted to risk anything by getting caught in traps. Then again, it's not like these kids would really try something while he was caught and vulnerable, right? So deep in thought he was, that he completely missed the looks of hunger that passed through the girls’ eyes, nor did he notice how they glanced at each other as if they were having a private conversation.
112.title: Ambushed by the Konohamaru Corps plus Hanabi Hyuga

choices: Hanabi. She gobbles him up with surprising ease.
Moegi. She hopes he doesn't give her indigestion.
Some other girls found him and decided to make a meal of him. But who are they?
1121.content:
Naruto blinked a few times, wondering how he had been captured so efficiently in less the two hours. 'This normally doesn't end till at least three hours have passed. Hmm, seems I underestimated how advantageous having Hanabi was for them.' Thought the blond as he looked at the trap he was caught in. His torso was bound by rope preventing him from using his arms, while hanging from another rope tied around his ankles. That one just so happened to be hanging from a tall tree and if he was seeing it right, there was a complex winch system at the end. The winch would allow the kids to lower him down easily.

In truth, Naruto could get free but, it would take at least a minute to get through the ropes knot. He mentally cursed all of his sensei’s for never teaching him the 'Rope Escape jutsu' or how to untie these more complex knots. Besides, the game wouldn't be much fun if he went all out on a few kids that weren't even ten yet.
------------------------------------------------------

Not far away and hidden by the trees, Konohamaru and Udon fell to the ground like sacks of potatoes. Their attackers just so happened to be Moegi and Hanabi, both whom had planned this whole thing out. Now they only needed to decide who would get the main course. "Moegi, before we make the decision can I ask a favor?" Seeing no harm in at least hearing out the request of the only female friend she had near her age, Moegi motioned for Hanabi to ask. "If I win, could you not eat Kono-kun?" Moegi raised an eyebrow at the request. It didn't really surprise her as she had thought Hanabi might have a small crush on him. Shrugging she gave her response, "Fine, 'IF' you win then I won't go eating Konohamaru as my constellation meal. But, you have to make up the difference by buying me lunch, all I can eat." Hanabi didn't even hesitate, "Deal! And I'll make sure to tell you what Naruto tastes like once I'm done eating." "Confident huh? Well too bad because I plan to snack on boss myself so you'll just have to hope Udon can hold you over."

The challenge was set and with that they played a quick game of Rock, Paper, Scissors to decide who would dine on the blond.
--------------------------------------------------

Naruto was feeling a little bored and was currently contemplating whether or not he should start freeing himself from the rope. He was snapped from his thoughts however when he felt the rope give a little. Surprised he turned to look at the makeshift winch but, could only make out the vague outline of a person, not who. He then heard a female voice from under him call out, "Let him loose!" The moment he heard that he realized what had happened. These people planned to eat him and where going to use the kids trap to do it. As gravity reasserted its hold on him, Naruto's mind went into overdrive, trying to think of a way out. Sadly he knew he was trapped as he hadn't even attempted to free himself yet and it would take longer than the fall down to do so. He still tried of course but in the end his head was engulfed in the wide open mouth of...
1121.title: Their just kids. What's the worst they can do?

choices: Rescued in the nick of time
11211.content:
Naruto's eyes were wide in terror when he saw Hanabi standing below him, mouth opened wide. Her pale eyes were twinkling with delight as the blond hurtled down helplessly towards her, and Naruto knew immediately that he would not be able to escape with anything less than a miracle.

Funny how those things never happened when you needed them.

Naruto's momentum as he fell worked perfectly to Hanabi's advantage. With as wide open as her mouth was, and as fast as he was falling, she was able to get him head-first down her gullet all the way up to his waist in a single gulp. Of course, she fell flat on her behind from the transfer of kinetic energy, but Naruto was in no shape to be escaping, tied up as he was.

While she couldn't really taste much of the blond through his clothes, Hanabi still got a good deal of enjoyment from the feeling of the older boy wriggling helplessly in her throat. She smacked he lips happily against Naruto's clothed bum as she began swallowing him the rest of the way.

Hanabi tilted her head back as she languidly gulped Naruto the rest of the way down. Considering that he was taller and bigger than her, the young Hyuuga's stomach was already bulging considerably. The front of her shirt was bunched up, riding up high over her distended gut. Her lips were up to Naruto's knees, already, and the blond was as good as digested. With this much of him already inside of her, Naruto would NOT be escaping, no matter what he tried.

She could hear the blonde shouting frantically from inside her belly as she gulped him down up to his shins. Soon only Naruto's feet were left outside of Hanabi's mouth and a good part of his body was already settling into her rumbling, gurgling stomach. Soon she would be digesting him. He would become a permanent part of her body.

As Naruto's toes passed her lips, Hanabi gave a hard swallow before she sighed contentedly. She just laid there a moment, feeling the blond continue to struggle futilely even as he was slowly deposited into her hungry stomach. She smiled in victory as she felt his feet and lower legs being pushed down her esophagus by the powerful muscles so that they could join the rest of him already curled up inside the Hyuuga's stomach.

"You're lucky, Naruto," she said cheerfully to her grossly distended stomach. "You'll to get to become part of the Hyuuga clan, once I finish digesting you. Hehe, I'll be unstoppable with all of that chakra of yours added to my body... Who knows? Maybe I'll even become the second woman Hokage. Wouldn't that be nice, Naruto? You'll get to fulfill your dream as a part of me."

She faintly heard a muffled whimper come from her belly. Then she felt the blond, now wholly trapped within the digestive sac that was her stomach, redouble his desperate writhing and struggles. But there was no way he would be able to escape her, now. He might as well just except that he would soon be nothing more then padding for her developing body and the leftovers being made into a steaming pile of shit.

She let out a belch, satisfied beyond measure with her meal. Smiling contentedly, Hanabi leaned herself against a tree in repose, just lying there and listening as her stomach began to churn around Naruto's still struggling body.

Does he get digested, or does somebody come to the blond's "rescue" at the last minute?
11211.title: Hanabi. She gobbles him up with surprising ease.

choices: Stay with Hanabi as Naruto is digested.
Konohamaru awakens and finds himself tied to a tree. What now?
112111.content:
Hanabi simply laid there, eyes closed and as happy as could be while Naruto desperately struggled and squirmed inside her belly. It was such a wonderful day, for the girl at least. As she laid there she could feel her stomach slowly constricting around her wonderfully filling meal. Giggling gently to herself at how good his movements felt before letting loose a rather wet belch. She made pleased 'Mmmm' noises as she licked her lips, finally able to taste a little more of his delightful flavor.

She made no motion to open her eyes even as she heard the telltale sound of someone walking up to her. Hanabi was in fact one of the rare few members of the Hyuga clan that were sensitive to chakra and the signature each source gave off. Mind that she was only 'just' able to actively notice chakra signatures that were familiar to her. "Enjoying yourself?" The person asked. Hanabi licked her lips again before answering. "Of course! He's quite the filling meal." She of course said this just as she gave her massively distended and wriggling stomach a firm pat. Almost as if in response her stomach have a loud groan and churning noise as the weaker acids finally started to pour from her stomach walls. "I can't help but wonder though, why big sister didn't eat him herself? I mean she had plenty of chances? Oh well, her loss!" Finally opening her eyes she turned to look at her companion, eyeing the belly said person seemed to be carrying. "So Moegi, how was your Udon?"

The now revealed Moegi rolled her eyes at the jab of her meals name before taking a seat next to the sated Hyuga girl. "Despite him suddenly waking once I was nearly done, my meal was okay." The orange haired pigtailed girl admitted. "Bet Boss tasted much better though." Moegi saw the concerned look that Hanabi gave her stomach and decided to put an end to her worries. "Stop! I know what you’re thinking and you don't need to worry. I left Konohamaru tied up to a tree shortly after releasing Naruto for you. Speaking of, how did he taste?" Hanabi looked at her distended gut as it groaned and gurgled gently around it's wiggling meal. "There's not much to say sadly. Between the rope and his clothes I couldn't really taste much of him. He felt wonderful going down however!"

Moegi blinked processing what she had just heard before an idea came to her. "You said 'couldn't taste much of him', that leads to one assuming that you did get some flavor from him." When Hanabi gave a hesitant nod Moegi grinned widely. "Well then, share!" Hanabi looked at her best friend like she had gone insane. "And just how do you propose I 'share' my meals flavor? You know firsthand that it's near impossible to simply describe such a thing." "I know that! That's why you are going to let me have a taste." "I am not throwing up my meal just so you can taste him Moegi!" Hanabi felt repulsed at the very thought. "Hanabi... There is a different way. I'll tell you what; I'll do it to you first so I can get a taste of Bosses flavor. If you don't like it then you don't need to do it to me and I won't ask you to do it ever again." As Hanabi poked the tip of her tongue out to lube her lips, and moaned inwardly as her lively stomach continued to gurgle around the squirming blond, she gave her friends words some thought. She had no idea what Moegi planned to do but, she trusted her friend to not try something. Besides, the girl wouldn't be able to stomach her while they were both currently digesting full sized meals.

Seeing Hanabi give a nod of consent Moegi asked her to close her eyes and just let her finish as she would likely feel the impulse to push her away. Closing her eyes Hanabi soon felt something soft press against her lips. She was confused by this and only became even more so when she felt something wet and slimy run over her lips. It didn't take long however for her to put the pieces together and realize that the wet thing was Moegi's tongue. Her mouth opened out of shock and soon found Moegi's tongue inside her mouth, exploring it in search of Naruto's elusive flavor. Minutes seemed to pass by before Moegi pulled away. Hanabi watched wide eyed and bright red as her friend worked her jaw as if trying to spread the flavors on her tongue around. "Your right. Not much flavor from him. Plenty from you though..." Hanabi simply chose to say nothing and go back to enjoying the slowly weakening movements of her meal as digestion picked up and stronger digestive acids started getting worked into his clothes and skin.
112111.title: The beginnings of digestion!

choices: Naruto suddenly starts healing while Hanabi continues to digest him.
Naruto's life ends as he is fully digested.
1121111.content:
Naruto wiggled in the cramped confines of Hanabi's stomach, desperate to escape. Her stomach was incredibly tight and what movement he could've made was further restricted by the rope that was still tied around him from earlier. This left him curled up in a manner reminiscent to a fetal position. If he wasn't in a such a deadly situation, Naruto would have found it rather amazing how much the young girls stomach had stretched in order to properly load him into it...

At this time however he could feel nothing but panic and desperation as the warm, wet, pulsing flesh massaged him from every angle, some of it semi-painfully as the weak tingling acids coating her stomach wall gradually turned into slightly stronger stinging ones. Still a part of him found it amazing how her digestive organ could stretch so much, yet still remain tight enough to not allow him the needed room to struggle too hard or effectively.

Still the fact was that he was trapped and would certainly die if he didn't find some way to escape, and without the use of his arms the chances of freedom where practically nonexistent. Not one to simply give in despite the odds, Naruto started slamming himself against the stomach walls by using his legs to accelerate himself against it – to little use, as it was incredibly cramped to begin with within the younger girl. So the dark-haired female easily handled him.

Not deterred by the lack of success, Naruto started struggling and ramming against the fleshy wall harder, hoping to burst out of the girl's stomach or at least force her throw him up. The continued ramming however wasn't having the effect that he hoped as his attempts if escaped did little but budging Hanabi's gut side to side, with no discomfort inflicted on the Hyuga. The stomach however was reacting to the movement. Realizing that it had food trapped inside of it, the stomach started releasing stronger acids into the chamber causing the bottom to start filling with the corrosive liquid.

Over the next few minutes Naruto slowly tired himself out with nothing to show for his efforts outside of utterly soaking his body with slimy acids that where quickly eroding and dissolving his clothes. He hissed in pain only to start screeching as he felt the acids slowly gouge open wounds into his skin, after all the moisture had been drained from his bodies protective veil. It would not be long till her stomach acids started working away at the more nutritious meat inside him.

--------

While Naruto was suffering the beginnings of an agonizing digestion, Hanabi was happily stroking her wiggiling and loudly churning stomach, relishing the feeling of her body melting down a boy the same age as her sister into a nutritious gooey past. She couldn't help but, continually fondle her large growling gut as digestion continued inside it. Not even talking and giggling with her best friend Moegi managed to make her stop for even a second. How her big sister hadn't eaten this boy herself before now was a compleat mystery to the younger girl. She knew that Hinata had wanted too, as Hanabi had snuck a peek at her sisters diary only a few days ago. The entry had made it very clear that Hinata had been wanting to swallow the boy for a while now but, it never said why she hadn't.

Hanabi shrugged her shoulders at the thought. 'Her loss.', she thought just before her belly gurgled and sloshed strongly enough to jiggle around. Hanabi nearly squealed in delight at that before leaning back against the tree again to continue enjoying the boys digestion.

----------

Finally was freed from the amazingly digestive resistant rope, Naruto started thrashing for all he was worth. The acids coating and actively eating away at his body only spurred him on to keep fighting for his survival. He fought valiantly. Punches and kicks struck against slimy acid covered stomach walls, while his screams of pain where covered up by the groaning and churning of Hanabi's stomach.

But try as he might, even his steel will had limits to what it could achive. And he knew that surviving an prolonged acid bath inside a girls stomach was not one of those. The fiery pain he felt as his skin blistered and seemed to melt all at the same time as he continued to bath in the gastric acids currently soaking him. Yelling and crying from the pain, Naruto kept wiggling and squirming as his skin was being turned into a wet, gooey mess, making way to reveal the nutritious protein-rich muscle underneath.

'Was this it?!?', he wondered. Had he survived through all the pain and suffering that had been heaped upon him to this point, just to end up as a filling meal for a little girl? Was the younger sister of the shy and kindhearted Hinata really going to digest him alive? Did everything he had accomplished in life truly amount to him ending as nothing more then some child bowel movement? What kind of an end to life was that?!?

Despite his continued struggles, Naruto had finally lost heart. He was now only struggling to try and keep his mind off the pain he was feeling as his muscles started to soften and melt. An odd thought crossed his mind as the stomach walls pressed down around him. 'I wonder if Hinata would have enjoyed digesting me as much as her sister seems to be?' The thought oddly made him smile as he let himself get lost in the weird daydream of being inside of the shy girl and slowly becoming a part of her.
1121111.title: Stay with Hanabi as Naruto is digested.

choices: Naruto becomes a permeant resident of Hanabi's stomach.
Hanabi rapidly digests and absorbs Naruto. He awakens inside Hanabi's mindscape.
11211111.content:
As Naruto thrashed around he soon noticed something. His body was suddenly starting to regenerate just as fast as it was dissolving. He realized that he had suddenly found himself in a stalemate. Hanabi couldn't fully digest him and he couldn't escape her stomach as his ninja tools had dissolved already and and he was in too much pain to be able to focus chakra for a jutsu. He didn't even know that Hanabi had somehow fortified her stomach against chakra usage for anyone inside of her with a modified variant of the Hyuga's Gentle Fist style. Had he known this it wouldn't have really mattered seeing as how he was trapped anyway within this agonizing hell that was a little girls stomach. If this kept up then they would get no where and he would be forced to continue suffering inside her. Naruto didn't know wether to laugh at the sick irony of this realization or to rage and curse every higher being and hungry female that he could think of for this injustice. Instead he settled for weeping and crying out in pain and agony as he had been. He could only hope someone would find him and put an end to this horror he was experiencing...

---------

Outside, Hanabi looked to her gut in bewilderment. Her belly, though rounder and softer then before, hadn't shrunk at all despite having been digesting for the last couple of hours. If that wasn't confusing enough, she could clearly feel, and too some degree see, Naruto still thrashing around inside of her as he was digested. Looking towards her friend Moegi and saw that while her own stomach seemed to be getting nowhere, Moegi's stomach had already been reduced to a bulge too big to be called pudge but, defiantly too small to be a potbelly. Hanabi wondered how this was possible. True, Naruto was bigger then Udon was but, there was no way Moegi should have been able to almost fully digest Udon while Hanabi had only softened her own thrashing meal.

Deciding she needed a better look at what was happening, Hanabi activated her Byakugan and peered into her stomach. She was very shocked at what she found. Naruto was apparently regenerating just as fast as her stomach was digesting him. Hanabi scowled at that. She had nor anticipated something like this. 'Is this why big sister never ate him? Because she would never be able to properly digest him?' She pondered on this while trying to think of some way that she could make the needed headway to digest him. Soon enough two ideas came to her. The first was that she not bother with the digestion and just leave him inside her stomach. Doing this would mean that she would never need to stop in her day just to eat as Naruto would be providing for her at all times. A quick jutsu could cause her stomach to shrink in size returning her mobility while causing more pain to her meal. It seemed like a fair trade for not simply digesting like he was suppose to.

The second option was to empower her stomach with so much chakra that Naruto would be digested in an instant. Doing this though would mean that Hanabi would be absorbing more the just vitamins and nutrition. She would most likely pull the entirety of Naruto's being into herself. Basically, Hanabi would be pulling Naruto into her mindscape where he would be forever trapped seeing as how he would no longer have a body to return to. She thought about it for a moment, before coming to a decision. Smirking, she started making hand signs...
11211111.title: Hanabi's Belly Pet?

choices: Continue following Hanabi as she goes about her life, while digesting Naruto.
Later at home, Hanabi suddenly starts to suffer from indigestion.
112111111.content:
Hanabi smirked to herself, knowing that her meal was going to be wishing that she could simply digest him, that is if he wasn't already wishing that. A small chuckle escaped her as the jutsu she used started to take effect. First, her belly flushed what she had managed to digest down into her intestines. This left very little in the ways of acids inside her stomach but, only for a moment. With a soft rumble the surface of her distended belly seemed to ripple, much like a pond would when you drop a rock into it's still waters. The sated little Hyuga opened her mouth and gave a loud, breathy belch, as her digestive tract contracted tighter around its contents. Naruto's form could now be clearly seen by anyone that looked at her belly.

Hanabi gave a giggle as she felt her stomach squeeze tighter and tighter around the boy. A very muffled sound came from the depths of her belly, quite abruptly and it took Hanabi a moment to realize that it wasn't the sound of Naruto screaming; it was in fact the sound of bones snapping under the pressure her stomach was putting on him. She gave another small giggle as she felt more then heard another bone give out. Naruto hadn't simply stopped moving though. He was in fact thrashing around as best as he could while trying to push her stomach walls away from him, if the imprint of his hands pressing outwards was anything to go on.

Hanabi pitied the idiot for thinking that such a thing would actually work. She figured that he deserved his punishment if he was truly that stupid. An evil grin crossed her face as her massive stomach continued to shrink more and more, having already shrunk down by a fourth of its full size. Feeling eyes upon her, Hanabi turned towards her friend Moegi and nearly busted out laughing at the wide eyed and slack jawed expression the girl was giving her gut. "Yes, Moegi?" She watched in amusement as her friend got over her shock enough to speak. "Hanabi w-what, what is happening to your stomach?"

Hanabi pondered on how to explain it as her ginger haired friend had asked a very legitimate question. "Well, he wasn't digesting. And I do happen to have better things to do with my life other then digesting him forever. That doesn't mean I'm ever going to let him out. I got him into my belly fair and square, so he is only allowed to leave my tummy once he is fully digested." Hanabi paused for a moment to see if Moegi was still following. Seeing that she did indeed still have her friends attention she continued. "Since I'm not going to let him out, I'd have to be able to keep him inside my stomach. This normally wouldn't be a problem as my tummy would have turned anyone else into a small bulge like you have. But Naruto is clearly different because he keeps healing as I digest him, so he isn't getting any smaller. If he's going to stay there then he has to be small enough that I can get up and walk around without much trouble." She paused a moment to think as a thought hit her. "In truth I think that this is why my big sister hasn't eaten him yet, or it's one of the reasons." Hanabi went on to explain how her sister would have been able to keep him in her stomach because, she is with a team that knows Naruto and they may put two and two together if she shows up with a meal that won't fully digest and Naruto goes missing.

Finally finishing up with her explanation, Hanabi turned her attention back to her belly and grinned happily. In the one hour after starting her jutsu, her belly was now just a bit larger then a basketball. "It's not shrinking anymore?" Asked her perplexed friend. "No. Seems it's done.", answered Hanabi as she gave the hard bulging sphere a gentle rub. She could feel the boys broken form quite clearly through her skin, though it would round out once it filled with acids again. Feeling a few twitches from inside, Hanabi smirked at knowing that Naruto was still very much alive and would continue to suffer for not simply digesting like he should have.

The little Hyuga turned towards the sound of her friend as she stood up. "Guess its time to go then, huh? We still need to drop Konohamaru off at home and I'll need to get rid of whatever is left of Udon." Agreeing with Moegi, Hanabi stood up, having only some trouble from the change in her center of gravity and how her belly blocked off certain movements. The girls moved back into the woods where they found Konohamaru having woken up only a few short moments ago. Hanabi was quick to correct this with a soft poke to the side of his neck. Both girls shared in carrying the weight of the boy back home.

As they slowly progressed towards Konohamaru's home, Hanabi though of her sister. If Hinata ever found out she had eaten Naruto, Hanabi could only hope that her big sister wouldn't react poorly. If she did, than as much as she disliked the idea, Hanabi would have to send her sister down to join Naruto in her stomach. Hanabi wondered how long she'd be able to keep this from her sister and truly hoped that Hinata wouldn't be angry with her once she did learn of it.
112111111.title: The Maelstrom trapped in the Firecracker.

choices: Hanabi gets spotted along the way.
Hanabi gets to her room with no issues
A sudden bout of stomach cramps hits.
1121111111.content:
Hanabi scowled as she moved through the halls of her clans compound. Despite her now sporting a relatively massive belly, something she clearly didn't have this morning, the most she had gotten was a confused glance from the front guard; he didn't even try looking with his Byakugan to ensure she was who she appeared to be, he just let her walk right in.

‘It’s no wonder why Onèe-sama is so worried about kidnappings if the guards won’t even question why their youngest heiress is returning with a massive belly that she she clearly wasn’t sporting when she left,’ the young Hyuga thought to herself. She paused in her walk and looked down at her bloated middle with the slightest of frowns marring her face.

It was a large semi-rounded mass protruding from her body with a few oddly placed bumps here and there. The bumps being parts of her still living Uzumaki meal that were either pushing back in some misguided attempt at freedom, something she would make certain would never happen, or simply parts of him that refused to break and bend under her bellies mighty digestive power.

She gave one of the bulges near the top a hard poke, only for it to not budge in the slightest. Grumbling to herself, Hanabi pushed harder feeling the bump slowly sink down into the churning depths of her stomach, only to then feel a different bulge forming elsewhere from her gut.

Grumbling to herself again, Hanabi figured that if her meal wanted to be that much of an annoyance that she just let her belly deal with him, which she was sure would happen, given enough time. Until then, she was stuck looking like she was in the final stages of pregnancy, which considering her own size, made her belly look even bigger on her.

Suddenly feeling a little self conscious about all the cream colored skin she was showing she gave the bottom of her shirt a pull, hoping to cover it up at least a little bit. Sadly, her shirt was already stretched as far as it could go, not even covering up a third of the creamy white orb that hung from her body. Thankfully, it was tightly packed enough that gravity didn’t seem to really affect it as there was no noticeable sag in the churning orb.

Huffing in indignation at her meals lack of complying to her will, aka turning into bouncy boobs to play with like her big sister has, Hanabi tried to ignore the slight bounce she felt in her gut as she not quite stomped back towards her room.

She was hoping to get away with a few more hours to try and further digest the crushed Uzumaki boy stewing in her digestive acids. If she was really lucky, then by the time Onèe-sama came home she’d be able to pass him off as having over eaten or simply built up gas in her system. And it would all start with getting back to the safety of her bedroom.
1121111111.title: Stewing in a Firecrackers belly.

choices: Sense of hunger. Seems more people will be joining Naruto.
11211111112.content:
Hanabi smiled as her belly gave off what she had come to considered a cute little gurgle and groaning sound as her stomach continued to eat away at its still very much alive and continually healing morsel.

As she lay on her futon in the safety of her room in nothing but a pair of white panties, Hanabi had come to a startling revelation. She absolutely loved feeling living things squirm pitifully inside her stomach as she slowly digested them alive. What had been seen as a slight annoyance less then half an hour ago, Hanabi was finding utter enjoyment in now.

Licking her lips she gave her bloated middle an affectionate pat and rub, giggling to herself in glee as she felt the stretched organ rumble under her fingertips. To Hanabi it seemed more like her belly was purring in contentment, much like how a cat would when you scratched them in just the right spot. All the while her Uzumaki morsel wriggled pitifully within his digestive hell. Well, he wriggled as well as someone with nearly every bone in their body being broken could at least. Honestly, she was slightly surprised to lay on her with her gut in the air like some great pale mountain, only to see her belly gently shift ever so slightly back and forth. She knew it could just be from her powerful stomach muscles churning him around but, the Hyuga munchkin thought she should give her tasty meal at least some credit.

“I wonder how big I’d be if I swallowed Hinata-Onèe, or maybe Natsu-san? She’d really make me big, but would she wiggle around any better then my morsel here?” Hanabi contemplated the idea of having her sister and Natsu join the broken Uzumaki in her belly. She could only imagine how big her tummy would be. She hoped they would squirm a lot as she digested them. “I bet I could use my belly as a makeshift chair or bed after that. Though I wonder how many people I’d be able to fit in my tummy? What do you think,” questioned the girl as gave her churning gut a playful slap.

The creamy-white rumbling mass sloshed and gurgled happily before an almost ominous growl came from within. Hanabi stared at her belly feeling somewhat perplexed at the sudden...
11211111112.title: Digestive intermission

choices: Hanabi decides to send Hinata to her stomach.
Once home Hanabi decides to visit Naruto first. Hinata can wait...
112111112.content:
Finishing her handseals Hanabi announced the name of the jutsu that would be the end for the boy in her stomach. "Regenerate from this! Jinsokuna shobun no jutsu (Rapid disposal technique)!"

The effect was immediate as digestion commenced and suddenly increased in intensity by a hundred fold. The little girls stomach violently, churning and gurgling as what would usually take hours to process, the boys meat was torn apart and dissolved in what seemed like seconds. Her bulging stomach convulsed as Naruto's muffled screams of agony were heard reverberating from within the organic sack that was soon to be his tomb.

Hanabi only smiled as she relished every last twitch and scream from her meal. She could literally feel how her stomach dried out his skin and ripped it open. She was starting to love the sensation of her digestive tract proceeding to rip off all his muscles and organs and how they were quickly reduced to sustenance as her stomach shrank as the acidity in its environment continued to increase much too the detriment of her meal.

Still, he continued to fight and struggle as she broke him down inside her gut. Nutritious parts turned into goop that her body quickly slurped up like soup... while the rest was flushed into the bowels. Soon all that remained was the remains of a degraded skeleton that currently soaked in her acids. After a minute they too broke down and were funneled into her intestinal tract.

Her body quickly and happily fed off the nutrients that had once been the boys body as circulation of her meal also progressed at high speed. Sadly, she was still too young to gain the full benefits of such a meat heavy meal. Still, Hanabi was pleased to find her body was now making the leap from little girl to preteen. She hoped to one day have boobs like her sister and looked forward to the day that she became so developed. A pleased sigh escaped her lips, as she stood, one hand firmly rubbing against her now flattened gut. "Big sister, you missed out big time! Digesting that boy felt better then I ever thought possible.", the young girl stated out loud as she stretched. She would need to relieve herself of what little remained of Naruto later.

"I have to admit Hanabi, that was pretty hardcore.", exclaimed Moegi. This however only earned a confused look from the young Hyuga girl. "I mean, I haven't spoken with Hinata much but, she clearly had a thing for the Boss. Not everyone would be willing to digest the guy their older sister liked." Hanabi however only seemed even more confused. "Um, Hanabi, you did know that your sister liked the Boss didn't you?", ask the young girl who now felt rather nervous. 'Hanabi couldn't have possible not known that, right?' Her unspoken question was answered when Hanabi gained a look of understanding, then shifted to realization only to suddenly go pale and start shaking in fright. "My Big sister liked him and you didn't think to check and see if I knew that?!? No! I didn't know that Big sis liked him! I never would have digested him if I knew that!"

Moegi could only watch as Hanabi started to fret and mutter as she tried to think of a way out of this new mess. "You could just eat her too..." Moegi flinched at how Hanabi suddenly turned her neck to look at her, silently wondering how she didn't get whiplash from it. "Moegi are you serious? Eat my big sister? The person who has been like a mother to me?" Moegi couldn't tell if that hope in her voice or if Hanabi simply thought she was a loon for even suggesting it.

"Alright! Geez Hanabi, it was just a suggestion.", the pigtailed girl said while holding up her hands in a surrender motion. "How about we go get Konohamaru and bring him home. We can use the time to think up ideas on how to keep your normally shy and kind sister from killing you for eating her crush." She didn't give Hanabi a chance to answer as before simply walking off towards the direction that Konohamaru lay. Hanabi was quick to join Moegi but, remained silent as she contemplated the idea of actually eating and digesting her big sister. I was a tempting idea and it would give her more people to play with once she visited her inner world. She would need to really think on this.
112111112.title: Digested by a little girl... Can it get any worse?

choices: We're gonna trick her (fatten the scape goat Meogi)
I'm gonna beat her (eat Meogi to prepare)
1121111121.content:
'If I'm going to survive trying to take on big sister I need a surefire method of getting her... problem is she's not as stupid as her crush was. The plan we used to get Naruto simply won't work on her. We'll also have to somehow account for her Byakugan... never thought I'd have to find a way around the family justu. As we are now we're simply not strong enough, so no matter what we either need to get stronger fast or somehow trick her.' As she ponders silently on this Hanabi feels the prospects of beating her sister are extremely low. This has very little to do with the actual difference in their skills, as Hanabi is already talented enough to provide Hinata with a difficult match. Add the chakura she absorbed from Naruto and she might even win against a fully serious Hinata... but Hanabi actually overestimates of Hinata's abilities by a decent margin. This is a natural result of the bias with which Hanabi has always seen her sister, as being better at absolutely everything. The time that she has spent seeing Hinata actually be better then Hanabi has only reinforced that image. However, all the time that Hanabi has spent looking up to and studying her big sister could instead prove to be a huge aid... as anything that might beat the much stronger "image" of Hinata in Hanabi's head would without a doubt beat the real one. The problem will be getting a plan that will beat that powerful "image" in the first place.

"We could try pushing the fallout somewhere else. There's that pink haired girl that the Boss liked, I think we could convince your sister that she did it. Though I'd hate to be in her shoes when Hinata-san gets a hold of her." Moegi says, the latest in a list of bad plans she'd voiced while they were heading to get Konohamaru. It was irritating chatter more then anything else, only distracting Hanabi from coming up with something that would actually WORK. 'After all, even if we somehow lied convincingly enough, one look at Sakura would be enough to prove that she hasn't had a meal of that size... on the other hand... that doesn't mean nobody besides me has grown from a human-sized meal.' With that thought in mind, Hanabi stole a quick look at Moegi, critically inspecting her to see what she's gained from her Udon meal.

She wasn't completely sure how much, but Hanabi thought that Moegi looked a bit bigger all-round... height, breadth of shoulders, depth of torso, and just a hint of pudge. The annoying part was... with the difference spit so many ways it was actually kind of hard to notice even when looking for it. Hanabi knew that on some level this is because of her own sudden growth spurt, which had caused her body to leap from a young girl to almost preteen. The common way of comparing size to her own body is completely skewed as a result of this rapid growth, and if she were to insist on using that as her standard then Moegi actually looks a bit smaller then before the meal. Hanabi is therefore basing her estimate of Moegi's growth on the wildlife around them... which is tricky at best. Still... bottom-line, if Hanabi wants to use Moegi as a scape goat, then she'll need to fatten that goat up some more. After all, to explain her own growth she'll be taking Moegi's place as having eaten Udon in the story she tells her sister. And what would be easier for Hanabi then to take her sister on while she's completely weighed down by Moegi? In fact, depending on how it goes, she might even be able to get out of needing to eat Hinata entirely. Probably the biggest downside to this plan is that she'd have to let Moegi eat Konohamaru... who she has feelings for. 'Just like sisters... both attracted to the biggest idiot our age' Hanabi thought with a smile. 'Surely I can come up with something that will work on Sis without sacrificing Konohamaru though... then again, with Onee-sama as the opponent, it's most likely a fight that can't be won without some kind of sacrifice.'

As Hanabi has been thinking on this they have come to where they left Konohamaru, and Moegi has not stopped coming up with pitifully childish and foolish plans that would be sure get them all killed or worse. Even while Moegi picks up the still unconscious Konohamaru she is still rattling off various bad ideas. "Maybe if we got Ebisu-sensei to help us? I know your sister's strong, but she can't stand up to someone with an adult's chakura and training. Or..." Hanabi found herself already tuning Moegi out again, taking Konohamaru from Moegi. 'Of all the stupid ideas... your actually thinking about telling that strict teacher!? He'd hand us over for her to do whatever she wanted short of killing us... that said, she's right about Onee-sama not being completely invincible. And Naruto has given my chakura a very considerable boost.' Wondering just how big that boost is she activates her Byakugan and pushes it to the limit. Hanabi is surprised to find that she's somehow gained not only the chakura, but even the development and skill to consider her old maximum easy. She quickly estimates that she's got at least twice, maybe even three times, as much chakura as she did before eating Naruto.

'If I've gained this much... maybe I actually can go head to head with Big Sister. Who am I kidding? This is just enough to make it a fight... if that. Still, if I can augment this chakura further, get the drop on Big Sis, I actually might just be able to overpower her. But the only source of chakura I can get in time for it to make a difference, is Moegi. I'd say Konohamaru as well, but I doubt absorbing his chakura would make much difference. The only reason that Moegi would be significant is because she's absorbed Udon's. But do I really want to take the risk of trying such a direct method?' The downside to this is that Hanabi would have no other viable option but to win if she were to eat Moegi... but it's Moegi's own fault that their in this mess anyways. If Moegi had just mentioned that Hinata liked the blond idiot they would have been able to completely avoid all this. Besides, regardless of the plan, Moegi ends up eaten by someone... and if somebodies got to eat Hanabi's best friend it should be Hanabi herself. As an added bonus, Hanabi can add Moegi to her mindscape.

Hanabi thinks over the two most viable plans she can think of, and decides firmly and resolutely on the better of the two. She then speaks up, "Moegi, follow me. I've figured out how we'll resolve this. But we'll need to do some preparation. I know somewhere safe for us to get ready." Hanabi leads Moegi to an out of the way Hyuga safehouse, one that she is confident her sister is not aware of. Once they arrive, Moegi asks "So, what's the plan?" Hanabi smiles as she replies...
1121111121.title: A question of how

choices: Natus Hyuga, Hanabi's caretaker come to find her
Hinata Hyuga, and we're not ready yet!
11211111211.content:
"We're gonna have to trick my onee-sama if this is going to end well." Hanabi says, "and in order to trick her convincingly we'll have to provide evidence that the scapegoat has enough of a gain compared to us that she'll believe it." Moegi is nodding along to this train of thought, perfectly happy to trust in Hanabi's brilliance to light the way for them both. Hanabi continues, "But for that to work, before anything else, you and me need to be close to the same size..." Moegi can hear the hesitation and can see how much the next part is paining Hanabi. "So... you'll need to eat Konohamaru-kun."

Moegi looks longingly at the former leader of the one time trio she had considered her closest friends. She remembers the taste, enhanced by the betrayal, of the other member as she swallowed him down. For herself, eating Konohamaru would be an absolute delight... but... she turns back to Hanabi through sheer force of will and looks into the eyes of the Hyuga, which are fighting to hold back tears. Moegi can't do that to Hanabi, even if that's what Hanabi herself is asking for. She embraces Hanabi, and holds her tight. "There must be another way Hanabi, I couldn't do that to you. I don't want to eat him if it would hurt you that badly. We'll find another way." Hanabi's emotional turmoil turns to rage in an instant and she throws Moegi off of her with chakura enhanced force. Moegi sails clear to the other end of the building and slams into the other wall with a mighty thud.

"THERE IS NO OTHER WAY YOU IDIOT! DO YOU THINK I WANT THIS!?" Hanabi's wrath is short-lived however, and she quietly repeats to herself, almost as if it where a mantra, "there is no other way, there is no other way, there is no other way." Moegi is frightened by the sudden strength her friend displayed, as well as the sudden outburst and the even more disturbing calm. Moegi starts to pick herself up to head to where Konohamaru still lies unconscious. On her way there, she sees someone approaching the safehouse.

Hanabi was so sure that this place would be safe... who else knows that it's here and has come to it?
11211111211.title: A True Friend

112111112111.content:
Moegi freezes, recognizing the tall, slender figure of Hanabi's green haired caretaker. She raises her hand, pointing out the adult shinobi. "Hanabi? I think we might have a problem." Hanabi looks up, and seeing Meogi pointing outside activates her Byakugan to see through the walls and instantly recognizes Natsu. It really shouldn't have come as a surprise that Natsu could find them here, after all Natsu herself was the one who showed this branch family hideout to Hanabi. Still, for a moment, Hanabi can't believe her eyes, stunned that they are already gonna be found. This lasts for only that single moment, after which Hanabi is already acting as a full shinobi should, and is thinking of ways to turn the situation to her own advantage. And the most obvious way has already made itself clear to her. It looks like there won't be any need for Konohamaru to be digested today after all. Quickly Hanabi gives instruction to her fellow conspirator and readies herself, keeping a close and wary eye on the maid with her Byakugan.



Meanwhile, outside Natsu has had a very long day. First Konohamaru, Moegi and Udon had come and absolutely begged her to allow Hanabi-sama to join them for the day, a request that she refused at first, for Hanabi-sama's own sake of course. However, as she had gone through the day the constant presence, nagging and pranks, even if they were all foiled, wore on her until she finally relented. She had made herself quite clear that Hanabi-sama was supposed to be back by 3, which seeing as she let them go before lunch, Natsu thought was pretty generous. Shortly after she let Hanabi-sama go Natsu found herself completely bogged down with all of the worst kinds of jobs, which she was normally able to excuse herself from using the reason of needing to look after Hanabi-sama. It was almost like the other maids, and especially the tough head-maid, were trying to get back at her for having had a free pass for so long. Natsu had done it all without any complaint, efficiently and effectively, but it had been exhausting nevertheless. When the green haired caretaker finished with all the tasks that she'd been assigned she noticed that it was already 4, an entire hour after she had told all the kids that Hanabi-sama was supposed to be back! Tired, dirty and actually a bit angry, Natsu cleaned herself up and reviewed places where Hanabi-sama would go to hide from her. The abandoned safe house topped the list by a fair margin, and she set out to head there first. As she had approached she noticed movement within the safe house, which told her that coming here first had been a good move. Now she just had to punish some misbehaving children before dragging Hanabi-sama back to her lessons. 'Bunch of bad influences, see if I let you run off with young Hanabi-sama again anytime soon. But before that, I'll correct you in the place of your Ebisu-sensei. Should let him know about this as well while I'm at it. It's just sheer irresponsibility!' Fuming, Natsu marched up to the main door with these thoughts in mind, not bothering to check inside with her Byakugan, and threw the door open to expose... A sealing tag!?



The plan couldn't have worked better. The safe house had come with a considerable stash of weapons and tools in order to aid defense if ever it were to be discovered. The sealing tag was something that Hanabi put in place to try to force Natsu to start moving toward the more confident and serious traps to the right side of the door, but it looks like the caretaker had simply failed to take care before entering what amounted to a fortress in disguise. The sealing tag had wrapped up the kunoichi from the moment that it came into contact with her hand, which had been extended forward from her body to point accusingly at Hanabi and her friends. While it was doing so the maid stumbled towards the right, where she was rather defenseless against the exploding tag placed on the floor, which dropped her into a quickly rigged web of rope. That rope pulled taunt around the kunoichi even as it unraveled from it's web-like starting shape and thoroughly enmeshed her. After this Natsu was unceremoniously dropped on her head, which triggered the last part of the trap, a simple pendulum with a 10 kg globe of steel on the end. (That's about 22 pounds for the metrically challenged.) As Natsu pulled herself for a moment, dazed, she was greeted by the sight of the mass of steel hitting her in the face. Now Hanabi and Moegi are left looking at a definitely unconscious Natsu, who has been so completely restrained and sealed that she wouldn't even pose a threat to them until she'd had about an hour to untangle herself. After she wakes up that is. Of course, giving her such time to recover isn't part of the plan.

Hanabi giggles as she rubs her hands together excitedly, proud of having thought of such a clever way to end all of this horrible mess. Once she had seen Natsu she realized all at once that there is more then one way to handle operation scapegoat. She'd been so focused on making sure that Moegi's gain was high enough to explain her as eating Naruto that she never thought of just finding a better way to explain her own gain. After all, if she were to tell Onee-sama that she ate Natsu, a full adult, as well as Udon, still a human size meal, then she would be able to have clearly gained over twice as much as Moegi, who digested Naruto, before Big Sis would question it. Plus, this way there are basically no downsides! Kono-kun stays outside of any stomachs, Onee-sama either drops the matter or ends up in Hanabi's stomach herself, Hanabi's current hunger for dinner is satisfied and Moegi, the only one to truly pay, is to blame for not warning Hanabi about Naruto and Hinata onee-sama to start with.

Of course, first things first, she needs to ACTUALLY eat Natsu. With Naruto she'd had it easy, just stand under him, open mouth, pull lever. Instant ramen, Hanabi thought with a giggle. Natsu is going to be much more cumbersome, as the tall maid will have to be manhandled into Hanabi's stomach from the start. Checking the condition of her new meal, Hanabi undresses her caretaker-turned-meal, intent on actually getting a good taste this time, and opens wide to begin swallowing Natsu's head. Placing the face down on her tongue and gathering the hair out of the way across Natsu's back, Hanabi is surprised at how well the mix of flavors go together. Hints of sweetness are overpowered by the unexpected sourness and saltiness of the delightful meal, a signature taste that stands apart from anything that Hanabi had ever had before. She swallowed steadily, enjoying herself much more then she had expected to, pulling the modest breasts into her mouth. Here the taste changes, adding a certain umami to the meaty meal, which is even more delicious with the addition. Hanabi only spends a little while tasting and chewing lightly on these small mounds before continuing on with her dinner. Ironically enough, it was Natsu herself who had always drilled it into Hanabi's head to finish all of her dinner, and now Hanabi is speeding up the delivery of the same to her stomach in keeping with those teachings. As she slid her mouth down the belly of the strict maid, she finds the umami taste replaced with a strengthening of the sweetness which had only been hinted at so far, a wonderful difference that speeds Hanabi on her way, wondering what other delights this lovely meal has in store. As she pulls Natsu's butt into her gaping maw, Hanabi finds a change which she is... less then pleased with, but only because she had built up such expectations, all the other changes having been for the better when they had occurred. When she reaches the ass, the flavor adds a noticeable bitterness, replacing the sweet, but it goes rather well with the most constant mixture of sour and salty which has formed the base of the caretaker's taste. Moving quickly along, Hanabi finds in the firmness of the long legs a strengthening of the saltiness, and the revival of the sweetness, which Hanabi takes delight in as perhaps the best taste yet. But alas, all good things must come to an end, and while following that excellent flavor Hanabi comes upon the end of the seemingly endless legs far sooner then expected.

Taking the final swallow, Hanabi looks down at her now massive middle in a little bit of confusion. She had felt more full after eating Naruto... and he was way smaller. If anything, she had been slightly worried that she'd run out of room before Natsu ran out of leg. Instead, Hanabi found herself only moderately content. While she found it strange, she also had more important things on her mind, and she needed to prepare herself for that part of things. Looking up, she see that Moegi is staring at her. "What?" Moegi blinks at the short, sharp question, then responds, "I was just surprised how easily you ate her Hanabi-chan." Hanabi can't fault her for that when she herself has had the same basic thought, but the pair still needs to get moving. And first on the list of priorities is for Moegi to get Konohamaru somewhere out of the way and for Hanabi to digest her second human meal.

The options for them both are rather simple. Hanabi can digest Natsu using the same jutsu that she used on Naruto and have Moegi hide Konohamaru somewhere nearby in the safe house, or Moegi can take Konohamaru back to the village and drop him off while Hanabi takes her time digesting her large dinner. If they take the first route, Hanabi will be able to resolve all of this today instead of tomorrow, plus she'll have Natsu in her mindscape to play with later, but it would leave Konohamaru in a precarious situation if Hinata were to take out both of herself and Moegi. On the other hand, if she takes her time, Natsu is gone for good, Konohamaru and Moegi are both at a slight risk while he's taken back to Konoha and she'll probably be digesting overnight.

What does Hanabi decide?
112111112111.title: Caretaker Taken Care Of

choices: Hanabi still feels underprepared to face Hinata.
1121111121111.content:
Hanabi's actions were to be ruled by a need for speed. She felt quite plainly and honestly that if she were to fail to deal with the situation with her sister that things would spiral out of control. Of course, given her father's likely course of action if she were to disappear for a night, along with Natsu, without any warning... well, the safe and secret hideout wouldn't stay secret for long. And if that action were to be taken before digestion was complete, bringing Hanabi face to face with Onee-sama to early. Hanabi shuddered at the thought alone. No, it'd be much better to handle this quickly, while things could still be fairly easily controlled. Therefore, she'd take care of this digestion business as quickly as possible, and made the same handseals that she had when she digested Naruto. "Jinsokuna shobun no jutsu (Rapid disposal technique)!"

Just as it had for Naruto, the stomach kicked into a ultra-high gear, digesting the woman who had looked after Hanabi as if she were actually her mother at 100 times the speed that would have progressed normally. With Naruto, who had already been dramatically weakened and was far smaller, this had made the remainder of digestion feel like it happened in seconds, but a better estimation would have been a couple minutes. Strangely, Natsu felt the opposite as her still unconcious body was hit with the sheer power of Hanabi's jutsu-enhanced belly.

To Hanabi it felt like ages watching her stomach shrink inch by inch as the flesh of the woman who raised her was steadily torn apart and converted into pure nutrients for Hanabi to absorb. She could feel it just as clearly as with the blonde idiot, as Natsu's skin was dried into a tough leather then shredded by savage acids, gouging out chunks of the muscles behind it which were brutally liquified into a goop which drained away into her intestines to fuel her body. Hanabi could sense Natsu's organs as they were split apart with savage and instant force, even fancying that she could recognize when some individual parts were crushed into the paste that would strengthen her. After an eternity, or maybe just a few minutes, Hanabi could only feel a skeleton remaining, which was attacked with the full fury of her gut, and slowly, ever so slowly weakened and broke down even Natsu's bones into a calcium which would help her to grow... just like milk.

While Hanabi's attention was firmly focused on the feeling of every ounce of Natsu being absorbed, her body was hard at work gathering up as much of it as possible and putting it to immediate use. When this new flood of sustenance began Hanabi was not quite ready to begin benefiting properly from a such a delightful dinner, but Natsu was generous enough to finish preparing Hanabi for such and to make a starting donation. Of course, it took the majority of what Natsu had to offer before Hanabi was ready, and even then only a small portion was set aside for such use at the time, but even so Hanabi was able begin to grow a more womanly figure.

When Hanabi came to herself after the last of Natsu had been assimilated into her body, she had to take stock of her situation as she would if she were regaining consciousness. As she did so, she noticed three things which would surprise her. First, Moegi and Kono-kun had left without her noticing. Normally, with what passes for stealth according to Moegi, Hanabi would have expected to never lose track of her friend. Given the added handicap of having to drag or carry Konohamaru? Hanabi was impressed. Second, she felt... wet... down at her most private place, and some instinct told her that it was different from having used the bathroom. She touched it for a moment, and it felt like a jolt of electricity, leaving her sighing as she came for the second time in her young life. The first time she recognized as the constant and drawn out feeling she got from absorbing Natsu. Third, she noticed that she had not only grown up some more, making a jump from a still preteen girl to a middle school lady, she had even developed somewhat in the chest and butt! True, they were both still small, but Natsu had made due with only slightly better, and she'd been a full grown adult. In all honesty, Hanabi's boobs were barely big enough to justify a training bra, if that, and her butt had just big enough to it to make her figure an hourglass... but it was a start!

"Thank you, thank you, thank you!" Hanabi squealed with delight. "I don't know what I did to deserve this Natsu-san, but thank you so much for the curves. I'll make sure to treasure them and to remember who got them started for me." Hanabi couldn't have been more pleased with the results, though she had definite plans on adding more to what Natsu had given her. After all, she still had to ensure that she'd be safe from Onee-sama. Question now is, should she visit her mindscape to thank Natsu for being so generous right away, or should she prioritize dealing with her big sister... which she is finally ready to do?
1121111121111.title: Becoming a Young Lady

choices: Spent too long goofing off, Hinata's training is done and she's vanished
Perfect timing, Hinata finishes training right as the pair arrive
11211111211111.content:
Hanabi looks herself over, observing how small her shorts and shirt had gotten on her new body. Her shirt had gotten to be about a size small after eating Naruto, but after adding Natsu it is getting much too small, being both short, baring a tiny amount of her midrift, and tight, getting somewhat stretched across the chest. Her shorts had been a little tighter after Naruto's addition, but after Natsu Hanabi was honestly worried that if she undid them that she wouldn't be able to button them back up again. An they hugged far closer at the legs then they were made to, and were now showing off a good 2 or 3 inches of thigh, instead of the rough inch the designer intended. Of course, this really shouldn't have come as a surprise... these cloths were made with an 8 year old Hanabi in mind, and now they were being worn by what physically is closer to a 13 year old Hanabi. 'Add a new wardrobe to the list of things to take care of' Hanabi sighed to herself. 'These cloths are not gonna survive another meal... not even an Moegi-size meal.'

Hanabi then wondered what was keeping her friend so long and activated her Byakugan to find Moegi. First she checks the area below herself, and while she doesn't find Moegi, she does spot Konohamru. Looks like she's already taken care of putting Kono-kun away safely, stashing him in the safehouses cellar, with a small weight placed on the trapdoor. If Konohamaru were to untangle himself, get something stable enough to stand on and give it a push with all his might it would hold for at least a few attempts before sliding out of the way. On the other hand, it will be pretty easy for Hanabi to push to the side after dealing with Onee-sama. 'Well, that's good. But where is Moegi?' Hanabi then turned her attention to the area above her, finding Moegi in what looks like one of the bedrooms, measuring her height. Hanabi deactivates her Byakugan with a giggle, suddenly wondering how much taller she's gotten herself. She heads upstairs to join her friend, and they have just a few more minutes of fun before the two of them have to go to settle everything anyways. After all, at this time of day Hinata Onee-sama is extremely easy to find. She's mid-training with their father, and won't be done for another 30 minutes. At Moegi and Hanabi's old speed this safe house is only about 25 minutes away, and they've both gained a significant amount of chakura, so they have some time to kill anyways. Why not see what the profits from their meals were?

Hanabi walked in as Moegi was turning back around to check her height. As Moegi looked at the place her finger was marking she raged, "122 cm? Seriously!? That's the fifth different height I've got from this stupid thing in six measurements... not to mention that's how tall I was before."

"Silly Moe-chan," Hanabi answered with a laugh. "That's why you need someone to measure you. Here, I'll get your height and you can measure mine, that way we'll get it done sooner and it'll be accurate."

15123.content:
Naruto had been expecting many things upon arriving to his inner world. It was here that the seal holding the dreaded Nine-Tailed Fox manifested in a fashion that allowed him to interact with it and in turn, interact with it's prisoner. The few times he had come here he was always left with this feeling of sadness and pain. He chalked it up to the lousy decor and tried to think no further on it.

Normally when he spoke to the fox it would follow a similar pattern of insult, insult, death threat, gloating, more insults and death threats before getting kicked out by the stupid fox. That's why when he heard nothing he grew concerned. Not for the fox, no. He'd never do that; at least not while the fuzzy jerk continued to be so hateful to him. Still, silence was an odd greeting to get from the fox.

Curious, Naruto slowly moved a bit closer to the giant gate, making sure to keep his eyes open for even the smallest movement in the darkness. How the fox could deal with being surrounded by such pitch blackness he'd never know. Naruto knew that he was taking a risk by moving so close. If he wasn't alert then the Fox just might lash out and manage to skewer him on those massive building sized claws. The furry SOB had certainly threatened to do so enough that Naruto could tell he'd thought on doing it for some time now.

He managed to reach the bars without issue, which only made him even more worried then before. The Kyūbi was a fox. There should be no way for him to sneak past the furballs hearing, especially with how big it's ears were. It made him wonder if Kyūbi was somehow out of commission. If so then that left him vulnerable. Without Kyūbi he wouldn't be able to pull out any sudden bursts of overwhelming chakra and power. The lack of fox could even screw with his faster then normal healing.

'What if I get attacked by a ninja? What if one of my friends get hurt because I couldn't get any of the Fox's chakra?' He though before an even more terrifying possibility crossed his mind. 'What if one of those girls that look at me like a big bowl of ramen manage to catch me?!?' He didn't even want to think of the possible harm that could come to him then.

Thankfully he didn't need to, as at that very moment a very human arm and hand shot out of the darkness on the other side of the gate and grabbed him. Naruto was suddenly pulled into the darkness faster then his mind could process.

Landing in an ungraceful heap on the water covered ground, Naruto quickly tried to jump up in a defensive stance only to fumble the whole way. He fully expected Kyūbi to take this chance and lash out at him or fill him with an overwhelming amount of its vile chakra so he'd lose control. Naruto did not expect to hear a feminine giggle from behind him and he most certainly did not expect to see the form of _______ with two fox ears on top of her head and nine swaying tails behind her. Both of which were the same color as her hair.

He couldn't help but, jaw drop and go wide eyed at the sight before him. The girl giggled into her hand, covering the smile behind it before slowly moving towards him, a small but, noticeable sashay in her walk.

Who did Kyūbi shape-shift into?

Here is my second interactive story idea. The only thing is that most of these stories have other anime-verses that they can follow and the Naruto ones get left high and dry after a time.
